metadata.funder: This project has received funding from the Instituto de Salud Carlos III under grant agreement (PI19/00154; PI19/00306; PI19/00381; PI19/00056; PI 20/00783). The project also received a research grant from Instituto de Salud Carlos III, Ministry of Science and Innovation (Spain), awarded on thecall for the creation of Health Outcomes-Oriented Cooperative Research Networks (RICORS), with reference RD21/0016/0016, co-funded with European Union – NextGenerationEU funds.

metadata.description: Data model specification documenting both individual-level data required to respond to the project's research question about the care pathway followed by acute ischaemic stroke patients. The data model specification includes the cohort definition, individual-level variable specification including data dictionaries and crosswalks for semantic interoperable definition of certain variables (i.e. health status, clinical conditions and comorbidities - (def)). See below some of the conventions used to document this data model.
metadata.notes:
1.0.0	First iteration of the common data model specification. Entities and variable descriptions based on the STROKE-ICTUS protocol common data model
1.1.0	Added description and selection criteria for Acute Stroke, thrombectomy and fibrinolysis cohorts
1.1.1	Stroke, thrombectomy and fibrinolysis selection criteria are refined
1.2.0	Major changes regarding including new prescripcion considering fibrinolitics in primary care and new comorbidity definition considering cardiac valvular disease (Elixhauser), and update in comorbidities definition and crosswalks to icp-1 /2 (i.e. ciap-1/2  in Spanish)
1.2.1	Minor changes regarding 'individual_level_data_model' specification completion and consistency checks with definitions
1.2.2	The following variables have been removed: ‘emergency_care_exitus_dt’, ‘start_date_prescription_fibrinolitics_dt’, ‘end_date_prescription_fibrinolitics_dt’, ‘hospital_icu_admission_dt’. ‘hospital_icu_stay’ variable has been added. Typo corrections in some variables.

cohort.name: CONCEPT-STROKE
cohort.description: Patients admitted to hospital due to acute ischemic stroke.
cohort.inclusion_criteria: Patients 18 years or older admitted to emergency care services (or with an unplanned admission to hospital) with a principal diagnosis of acute ischemic stroke (AIS) during the study period
cohort.exclusion_criteria: Patients 17 years or younger; Patients with a diagnosis of acute hemorragic stroke or with other non-specific stroke diagnoses (i.e. transient ischemic attack - TIA)

variables.label: patient_id
variables.description: pseudoid of the person included in the cohort

variables.label: hospital_cd
variables.description: hospital code
variables.observations_comments: https://www.sanidad.gob.es/ciudadanos/prestaciones/centrosServiciosSNS/hospitales/home.htm

variables.label: hospital_st
variables.description: hospital name

variables.label: ccaa_cd
variables.description: area of residence of the person included in the cohort (nuts 2) (at the time of entering the cohort)

variables.label: healthcare_area_cd
variables.description: healthcare area of residence of the patient
variables.observations_comments: Map to Atlas VPM healthcare area codes

variables.label: age_nm
variables.description: age of the patient included in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.observations_comments: age_nm >= 18 | age_nm <= 115

variables.label: sex_cd
variables.description: sex of the patient included in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)

variables.label: municipality_code_cd
variables.description: municipality (INE code - 5 digits - without end control digit) of patient's residence

variables.label: zip_code_cd
variables.description: zip code of patient's residence

variables.label: type_admission_cd
variables.description: type of admission
variables.observations_comments: R.D. 69/2015 (https://www.boe.es/buscar/act.php?id=BOE-A-2015-1235)

variables.label: hospital_admission_date_dt
variables.description: date of hospital admission

variables.label: hospital_intervention_date_dt
variables.description: date of main intervention (surgery)

variables.label: hospital_discharge_date_dt
variables.description: date of discharge from hospital

variables.label: hospital_type_discharge_cd
variables.description: type of hospital discharge
variables.transformations_from_origin: 1 "Home", 2 "Transfer to another hospital", 3 "Voluntary discharge", 4 "Exitus", 5 "Transfer to a social-health center", 8 "Others", 9 "Unknown"
variables.observations_comments: R.D. 69/2015 (https://www.boe.es/buscar/act.php?id=BOE-A-2015-1235)

variables.label: inhospital_thrombectomy_bl
variables.description: performance of procedure in hospital episode: mechanical endovascular thrombectomy
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_inhospital_thrombectomy_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found

variables.label: inhospital_fibrinolysis_bl
variables.description: performance of procedure in hospital episode: fibrinolysis
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_inhospital_fibrinolysis_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found

variables.label: type_ischemic_stroke_bl
variables.description: characterization of the type of ischemic stroke by etiology
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_type_ischemic_stroke_bl' tab.

variables.label: socioeconomic_level_cd
variables.description: socioeconomic group (approximated through the level of pharmaceutical co-payment)
variables.transformations_from_origin: 1 "TSI001: Free pharmacy", 2 "TSI002-01: 10% limit copayment (pensioners type I)", 3 "TSI002-02: 10% limit copaymen (pensioners type II)", 4 "TSI003: 40% limit copayment (insured type I, income <18,000)", 5  "TSI004: 50% limit copayment (insured type
variables.observations_comments: R.D. 1718/2010 (https://www.boe.es/buscar/act.php?id=BOE-A-2012-5403)

variables.label: admission_emergency_care_dt
variables.description: date and time of admission to the emergency (admission)

variables.label: triage_emergency_care_dt
variables.description: date and time of emergency triage

variables.label: first_asisstance_medical_dt
variables.description: date and time of first medical assistance in the emergency

variables.label: admission_to_observation_ward_dt
variables.description: date and time of transfer to the observation room in the emergency

variables.label: internal_neurology_consultation_dt
variables.description: date and time of neurology interconsultation

variables.label: ct_mri_dt
variables.description: date and time of ct/mri (medical imaging test)

variables.label: ct_inhospital_bl
variables.description: performance of procedure inhospital episode: ct head/neck
variables.observations_comments: Value is TRUE if it exists a CT in the hospital

variables.label: mri_inhospital_bl
variables.description: performance of procedure inhospital episode: mri head/neck
variables.observations_comments: Value is TRUE if it exists a MRI in the hospital

variables.label: thrombolysis_emergency_dt
variables.description: date and time of procedure performed in emergency episode: thrombolysis (i.e., fibrinolysis)

variables.label: discharge_from_emergency_dt
variables.description: date and time of discharge from emergency

variables.label: discharge_emergency_bl
variables.description: if exists discharge from emergency
variables.observations_comments: R.D. 69/2015 (https://www.boe.es/buscar/pdf/2015/BOE-A-2015-1235-consolidado.pdf). Value is TRUE if it exists a discharge from emergency.

variables.label: exitus_dt
variables.description: date of death

variables.label: n_admission_prior_emergency_nm
variables.description: number of admissions prior to the index case in emergency (in the 3 months prior to admission for stroke)

variables.label: n_admission_prior_inhospital_nm
variables.description: number of admissions prior to the index case in the hospital (in the 3 months prior to admission for stroke)

variables.label: date_first_readmissions_30days_all_cause_dt
variables.description: date of first all-cause readmission within 30 days of discharge from index hospital case

variables.label: readmissions_30days_bl
variables.description: all-cause readmissions within 30 days of discharge from the index inpatient case
variables.observations_comments: Value is TRUE if it exists readmissions within 30 days of discharge from the index inpatient case

variables.label: anticoagulants_prescriptions_bl
variables.description: prescription in primary care (outpatient) of drugs: anticoagulants
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_atc_code_anticoagulants_cd' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found at the time of admission.

variables.label: atc_code_anticoagulants_cd
variables.description: atc code of the prescribed anticoagulant drug
variables.observations_comments: If a patient has several ATC codes with active prescriptions, it is sufficient to include the ATC of any one of them (only one).

variables.label: start_date_prescription_anticoagulants_dt
variables.description: prescription start date of prescription of drug family: anticoagulants
variables.observations_comments: The prescription start date must be prior to the emergency visit or hospital admission.

variables.label: end_date_prescription_anticoagulants_dt
variables.description: end date of prescription for drug in family: anticoagulants

variables.label: antiarrhythmics_prescription_bl
variables.description: prescription in primary care (outpatient) of drug: antiarrhythmics
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_atc_code_antiarrhythmic_cd' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found at the time of admission.

variables.label: atc_code_antiarrhythmic_cd
variables.description: atc code of the prescribed anti-arrhythmic drug
variables.observations_comments: If a patient has several ATC codes with active prescriptions, it is sufficient to include the ATC of any one of them (only one).

variables.label: start_date_prescription_antiarrhythmic_dt
variables.description: start date of the prescription of the drug of the family: antiarrhythmic drugs
variables.observations_comments: The prescription start date must be prior to the emergency visit or hospital admission.

variables.label: end_date_prescription_antiarrhythmic_dt
variables.description: end date of prescription of drug of the family: antiarrhythmic drugs

variables.label: antihypertensive_prescription_bl
variables.description: prescription in primary care (outpatient) for drug of the family: antihypertensive drugs
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_atc_code_antihypertensive_cd' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found at the time of admission.

variables.label: atc_code_antihypertensive_cd
variables.description: atc code of the prescribed anti-arrhythmic drug
variables.observations_comments: If a patient has several ATC codes with active prescriptions, it is sufficient to include the ATC of any one of them (only one).

variables.label: start_date_prescription_antihypertensive_dt
variables.description: start date of the prescription of the drug of the family: antihypertensive drugs
variables.observations_comments: The prescription start date must be prior to the emergency visit or hospital admission.

variables.label: end_date_prescription_antihypertensive_dt
variables.description: end date of prescription of drug in family: antihypertensive drugs

variables.label: antiaggregants_prescription_bl
variables.description: prescription in primary care (outpatient) of drugs of the family: antiaggregants
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_atc_code_antiaggregants_cd' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found at the time of admission.

variables.label: atc_code_antiaggregants_cd
variables.description: atc code of the antiplatelet drug prescribed
variables.observations_comments: If a patient has several ATC codes with active prescriptions, it is sufficient to include the ATC of any one of them (only one).

variables.label: start_date_prescription_antiaggregants_dt
variables.description: start date of prescription of drug of the family: antiaggregants
variables.observations_comments: The prescription start date must be prior to the emergency visit or hospital admission.

variables.label: end_date_prescription_antiaggregants_dt
variables.description: end date of prescription of drug in the family: antiaggregants

variables.label: fibrinolitics_prescriptions_bl
variables.description: prescription in primary care (outpatient) of drugs of the family: fibrinolitics
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_atc_code_fibrinolitics_cd' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found at the time of admission.

variables.label: atc_code_fibrinolitics_cd
variables.description: atc code of the fibrinolitics drug prescribed
variables.observations_comments: If a patient has several ATC codes with active prescriptions, it is sufficient to include the ATC of any one of them (only one).

variables.label: nihss_score_nm
variables.description: national institutes of health stroke scale
variables.observations_comments: https://www.stroke.nih.gov/documents/NIH_Stroke_Scale_508C.pdf

variables.label: nihss_score_date_dt
variables.description: date on which nihss was calculated

variables.label: modified_rankin_scale_cd
variables.description: modified rankin scale (mrs)
variables.standard_classification: Modified Rankin Scale (mRS)  (see link to the standard at 'observations')
variables.observations_comments: https://manual.jointcommission.org/releases/TJC2018A/DataElem0569.html#:~:text=The%20Modified%20Rankin%20Score%20(mRS,measure%20in%20stroke%20clinical%20trials

variables.label: modified_rankin_scale_dt
variables.description: date on which mrs is calculated for you
variables.observations_comments: R.D. 174/2011 (https://www.boe.es/buscar/doc.php?id=BOE-A-2011-3174)

variables.label: barthel_index_nm
variables.description: barthel index (degree of dependency)
variables.standard_classification: Barthel Scales (see link to the normative specification at 'observations')
variables.transformations_from_origin: Options: 1-< 20 Total; 2-20-35 Severe; 3-40-55 Moderate; 4-≥ 60 Mild; 5-100 Independent
variables.observations_comments: Barthel index value is that measured at any time after discharge from the emergency or hospitalisation. If there are several Barthel records, the one closest to the episode of suspected stroke. The Barthel value is intended to be used as a functional outcome measure in addition to mortality. R.D. 174/2011 (https://www.boe.es/buscar/doc.php?id=BOE-A-2011-3174)

variables.label: barthel_index_dt
variables.description: date on which the barthel index is calculated.

variables.label: exitus_bl
variables.description: patient's condition of death
variables.observations_comments: It will be TRUE whenever there is a date of death whatever its origin or a type of discharge == "exitus" whatever its origin even if the date of death is not recorded (the date of discharge will then be considered by default).

variables.label: heart_failure_bl
variables.description: history of heart failure
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_heart_failure_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.label: hypertension_bl
variables.description: history of hipertension
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_hypertension_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.label: diabetes_bl
variables.description: history of diabetes
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_diabetes_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.label: atrial_fibrillation_bl
variables.description: history of atrial fibrillation
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_atrial_fibrillation_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.label: valvular_disease_bl
variables.description: history of valvular disease
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_valvular_disease_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.label: hospital_icu_admission_bl
variables.description: has the patient being admitted to icu?
variables.observations_comments: Calculated with hospital_icu_stay

variables.label: hospital_icu_stay
variables.description: length of icu stay
